title: Add FumajimeMura Z-Image Turbo to Creative
author: pollinations-ai[bot]

gist.headline: Turbo mode engaged
gist.blurb: FumajimeMura Z-Image Turbo joins the showcase. It's a high-speed batch generator, because sometimes you need all the pixels at once.
gist.summary: Added FumajimeMura Z-Image Turbo to the community apps list, enabling high-speed batch image generation via Flux Z-Image.
gist.impact: Users can now access a dedicated tool for rapid, bulk image creation using the latest models.
gist.visual_concept: A retro 'turbo' machine or conveyor belt producing images rapidly. Polly the Bee and the Robot managing the flow.
gist.image_prompt: Cozy pixel art scene of a retro machine labeled 'TURBO' ejecting a rapid stream of polaroid photos. The cute robot mascot catches them in a neat stack while Polly the bee hovers nearby with a clipboard checking the speed. Lime green (#ecf874) machine lights and pastel gradient background. Warm lighting, lo-fi 8-bit aesthetic like Stardew Valley. Chunky sprites, emotionally warm.
